entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Caribou
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:22 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Caribou Point 1:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending this evening then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain. High zero.
